channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: ðŸ”´ 21:13 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages.
item.description: ðŸ”´ 21:13 Air anxiety in the Nikolaev area follow further messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
